Articles.Content:
First of all I\'m going to say that this game is awesome.

I\'m an engineering student that loves C programming and the space and such. So finding a game like this one made me very happy ;D

Its the first day I play this game and already bought it

The second thing I have to say is that I found your game because someone posted the link in a blog of a mod of minecraft called IndustrialCraft2 xD And I\'m sure I\'m not the only one xDD

I feel this game is going to be as awesome as a real spaceship so keep the good job and happy coding!\n

btw, the conditions for the password in the forum are way to hard, and I think that the user from the main webpage and the one in the forum should be linked, or be the same.

Sorry for my English.

Welcome to the forums!

I\'m also a Minecraft fan.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!
